rs:sqlResource.query: select language.language_id, language.name "langName", film.film_id, title, release_year "year", comment, genre, city, country from language left outer join film on film.language_id = language.language_id left outer join film_comment on film.film_id = film_comment.film_id left outer join film_genre on film.film_id = film_genre.film_id left outer join film_origin on film.film_id = film_origin.film_id
